## AlLocatorMatrix.resolveURL() method

Arguably the only important general-purpose functionality of this service. Calculates a URL from a location identifier, an optional path fragment, and an optional context.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
resolveURL(locTypeId: string, path?: string, context?: AlLocationContext): string;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  locTypeId | <code>string</code> |  |
|  path | <code>string</code> |  |
|  context | <code>AlLocationContext</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`
